description: This file provides the implementation of a platform-dependent utility function for creating an HTTP Simple Server object. It includes licensing information, descriptive comments, and a single function 'HttpCreateSimpleServer' that delegates the creation to 'HttpSsoCreate'.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpCreateSimpleServer(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns an instance of HTTP Simple Server object by delegating to 'HttpSsoCreate'.
